title: First Free Ad Blocker on the Apple App Store Arrives; The Adblock Autumn: Adblock Plus for iOS 2nd from ABP this Month
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 8:15 AM   Adblock Plus 
COLOGNE, Germany -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Adblock Plus , the #1 most popular browser extension for blocking annoying online advertisements with over 400 million downloads, today announced Adblock Plus for iOS app is now available in the Apple App Store for all iOS devices. The new app lets users block annoying ads automatically on the Safari browser. It is the first ad blocker for iOS 9 that is completely free. 
“A couple of weeks ago, we launched our own full-featured Adblock Browser app on the App Store. Now that iOS 9 is officially available, we felt it was equally important to make ad blocking available for all iOS users who want to continue using Apple’s Safari browser,” said Till Faida, co-founder of Adblock Plus. “Either way, users will experience all the ad blocking benefits of Adblock Plus, including using less data from their data plans, faster page downloads, security from malvertising, better privacy and longer battery life.” 
How To Use Adblock Plus for iOS App 
To enable ad blocking features in iOS, first download the Adblock Plus for iOS app . When the app opens, users will see instructions on how to activate the familiar content blocking features of Adblock Plus within their system-wide iOS settings. After activation, the Adblock Plus app will automatically block annoying ads in Safari. Because Safari is the default browser on iOS devices, when users click on any URL links in an email, text message or website, the Safari browser will open with all annoying ads blocked automatically. 
Alternatively, users can install Adblock Browser , which is a complete browser app that has all the ad blocking features already built in. 
Adblock Plus for iOS Features 
1. Safety and Privacy - Lots of nasty stuff like malware and tracking can hide behind ads. In fact, according to a new report, “malvertising” tripled in the last year . Adblock Browser for iOS helps: Reduce risk of malware infection Improve privacy on mobile devices 
2. Faster Page Loads and Reduced Data Costs Pages load faster because the ads do not have to load Multiple studies have shown that blocking ads saves significant data bandwidth and battery life ( Microsoft study , Berkeley study ) 
3. Flexible Ad Blocking Settings: Support ads on your favorite websites by whitelisting the site Change the default settings to block all ads Disable tracking and social media buttons, or add additional filter lists to precisely tailor your Internet viewing preferences Multi-language support

Adblock Plus is a free download for mobile users on iOS and Android, and a free browser add-on for Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Internet Explorer, Maxthon and Opera.
